text: læa hak rea yud wela kar lngthosʹ phwk khea xxk pi xik raya wela hnung thi di kahnd wi nænxn phwk khea ca klaw wa xari hrux di yabyang man wi phung ru theid wan sung kar lngthosʹ ca mayang phwk khea man ca mi lawen pi cak phwk khea læa man ca hxmlxm phwk khea tam thi phwk khea di yeaa yey man
